title: Freelance - Web Developer
description: Development of a website and a backend for IDEA Explorers, following a Figma mockup. Using Nextjs, MongoDB and Docker to create a solid and performant infrastructure.

title: Internship - Software developer
description: I developed a web configuration panel using Angular for a photo analysis tool, primarily used by banks and insurance companies to process administrative documents, during my internship at Luminess.

title: Internship - Front-end developer
description: A remote internship in a start-up that develops a discord bot. I was in charge of the front-end part of the showcase website and a part of the dashboard.

title: Internship - Developer
location: Centre hospitalier intercommunal Elbeuf Louviers Val de Reuil
description: Start of the development of a web application for the hospital's workers. I was in charge of the front-end and back-end part of the application.
